nodes.text: The EG-series power droid was a series of power droids manufactured by Veril Line Systems that included the EG-4 power droid, the first power droid brought to market, and its successor, the EG-6 power droid. In response to Industrial Automaton's release of the nearly-identical GNK-series power droid, Veril Line Systems released the S9-series heavy power droid, a larger and more expensive variation of the EG-6. Veril Line System's IN-4 information droid was built using the same basic chassis as the EG-series.
